verses.verse: Being therefore <WG3767> justified <WG1344> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102>, we have <WG2192> peace <WG1515> with <WG4314> God <WG2316> through <WG1223> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>;

through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> we have <WG2192> had our access <WG4318> by <WG1223> faith <WG4102> into <WG1519> this <WG3778> grace <WG5485> wherein <WG1722> we stand <WG2476>; and <WG2532> we rejoice <WG2744> in <WG1909> hope <WG1680> of the glory <WG1391> of God <WG2316>.

And <WG1161> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> so <WG235>, but we also <WG2532> rejoice <WG2744> in <WG1722> our tribulations <WG2347>: knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> tribulation <WG2347> worketh <WG2716> stedfastness <WG5281>;
and <WG1161> stedfastness <WG5281>, approvedness <WG1382>; and <WG1161> approvedness <WG1382>, hope <WG1680>:

and <WG1161> hope <WG1680> putteth <WG2617> not <WG3756> to shame <WG2617>; because <WG3754> the love <WG26> of God <WG2316> hath been shed abroad <WG1632> in <WG1722> our <WG2257> hearts <WG2588> through <WG1223> the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> which was given <WG1325> unto us <WG2254>.
For <WG1063> while <WG5607> we <WG2257> were <WG5607> yet <WG2089> weak <WG772>, in due <WG2596> season <WG2540> Christ <WG5547> died <WG599> for <WG5228> the ungodly <WG765>.

For <WG1063> scarcely <WG3433> for <WG5228> a righteous man <WG1342> will <WG599> one <WG5100> die <WG599>: for <WG5228> peradventure <WG5029> for <WG5228> the good man <WG18> some <WG5100> one would <WG5111> even <WG2532> dare <WG5111> to die <WG599>.

But <WG1161> God <WG2316> commendeth <WG4921> his <WG1438> own love <WG26> toward <WG1519> us <WG2248>, in that <WG3754>, while <WG5607> we <WG2257> were <WG5607> yet <WG2089> sinners <WG268>, Christ <WG5547> died <WG599> for <WG5228> us <WG2257>.

Much <WG4183> more <WG3123> then <WG3767>, being <WG1344> now <WG3568> justified <WG1344> by <WG1722> his <WG846> blood <WG129>, shall we be saved <WG4982> from <WG575> the wrath <WG3709> of God through <WG1223> him <WG846>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487>, while we were <WG5607> enemies <WG2190>, we were reconciled <WG2644> to God <WG2316> through <WG1223> the death <WG2288> of his <WG846> Son <WG5207>, much <WG4183> more <WG3123>, being reconciled <WG2644>, shall we be saved <WG4982> by <WG1722> his <WG846> life <WG2222>;

and <WG1161> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> so <WG235>, but we <WG2744> also <WG2532> rejoice <WG2744> in <WG1722> God <WG2316> through <WG1223> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> we have <WG2983> now <WG3568> received <WG2983> the reconciliation <WG2643>.

Therefore <WG5124>, as <WG5618> through <WG1223> one <WG1520> man <WG444> sin <WG266> entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> the world <WG2889>, and <WG2532> death <WG2288> through <WG1223> sin <WG266>; and <WG2532> so <WG3779> death <WG2288> passed <WG1330> unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> men <WG444>, for <WG1909> that <WG3739> all <WG3956> sinned <WG264>: â€”

for <WG1063> until <WG891> the law <WG3551> sin <WG266> was <WG2258> in <WG1722> the world <WG2889>; but <WG1161> sin <WG266> is <WG1677> not <WG3756> imputed <WG1677> when there is <WG5607> no <WG3361> law <WG3551>.

Nevertheless <WG235> death <WG2288> reigned <WG936> from <WG575> Adam <WG76> until <WG3360> Moses <WG3475>, even <WG2532> over <WG1909> them that had <WG264> not <WG3361> sinned <WG264> after <WG1909> the likeness <WG3667> of <WG3847> Adam <WG76>'s transgression <WG3847>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> a figure <WG5179> of him that was to come <WG3195>.

But <WG235> not <WG3756> as <WG5613> the trespass <WG3900>, so <WG3779> also <WG2532> is the free gift <WG5486>. For <WG1063> if <WG1487> by the trespass <WG3900> of the one <WG1520> the many <WG4183> died <WG599>, much <WG4183> more <WG3123> did the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> the gift <WG1431> by <WG1722> the grace <WG5485> of the one <WG1520> man <WG444>, Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, abound <WG4052> unto <WG1519> the many <WG4183>.

And <WG2532> not <WG3756> as <WG5613> through <WG1223> one <WG1520> that sinned <WG264>, so is the gift <WG1434>: for <WG1063> the judgment <WG2917> came of <WG1537> one <WG1520> unto <WG1519> condemnation <WG2631>, but <WG1161> the free gift <WG5486> came of <WG1537> many <WG4183> trespasses <WG3900> unto <WG1519> justification <WG1345>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487>, by <WG3900> the trespass <WG3900> of the one <WG1520>, death <WG2288> reigned <WG936> through <WG1223> the one <WG1520>; much <WG4183> more <WG3123> shall they that receive <WG2983> the abundance <WG4050> of grace <WG5485> and <WG2532> of the gift <WG1431> of righteousness <WG1343> reign <WG936> in <WG1722> life <WG2222> through <WG1223> the one <WG1520>, even Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>.

So <WG686> then <WG3767> as <WG5613> through <WG1223> one <WG1520> trespass <WG3900> the judgment came unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> men <WG444> to <WG1519> condemnation <WG2631>; even <WG2532> so <WG3779> through <WG1223> one <WG1520> act of righteousness <WG1345> the free gift came unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> men <WG444> to <WG1519> justification <WG1347> of life <WG2222>.

For <WG1063> as <WG5618> through <WG1223> the one <WG1520> man <WG444>'s disobedience <WG3876> the many <WG4183> were made <WG2525> sinners <WG268>, even <WG3779> so <WG2532> through <WG1223> the obedience <WG5218> of the one <WG1520> shall <WG2525> the many <WG4183> be made <WG2525> righteous <WG1342>.

And <WG1161> the law <WG3551> came <WG3922> in besides <WG2443>, that the trespass <WG3900> might abound <WG4121>; but <WG1161> where <WG3757> sin <WG266> abounded <WG4121>, grace <WG5485> did abound more exceedingly <WG5248>:

that <WG2443>, as <WG5618> sin <WG266> reigned <WG936> in <WG1722> death <WG2288>, even <WG2532> so <WG3779> might <WG936> grace <WG5485> reign <WG936> through <WG1223> righteousness <WG1343> unto <WG1519> eternal <WG166> life <WG2222> through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962>.
